      • getOntologyName

        public java.lang.String getOntologyName(java.lang.String namespace)
        Maps the namespace of an ontology to the given ontology name
        Parameters:
        namespace - the namespace of the desired ontology
        Returns:
        the name of the ontology for the given namespace. The namespace can optionally end in #

      • getNamedOntClass

        public NamedOntClass getNamedOntClass(SemanticType st)
        Maps semantic types to their NamedOntClass objects. Tries to optimize the search assuming '#' is used to distinguish namespaces from local names.
        Parameters:
        st - the semantic type to search for
        Returns:
        the named ontology class for the given semantic type or null if none exists.

      • getNamedOntClass

        public NamedOntClass getNamedOntClass(java.lang.String namespace,
                                      java.lang.String localName)
        Maps namespaces and local names to NamedOntClass objects
        Parameters:
        namespace - the namespace of the class
        localName - the local name (id) of the class within the namespace
        Returns:
        the named ontology class for the given semantic type or null if none exists.

      • getNamedOntClass

        public NamedOntClass getNamedOntClass(java.lang.String conceptId,
                                      boolean libraryClassesOnly)
        Returns class name with the given concept id in the ontologies managed by the catalog.
        Parameters:
        conceptId - complete name of class (with namespace)
        libraryClassesOnly - if true, search only those classes in one of the library ontologies
        Returns:
        The named ontology class for the given concept id (local name plus namespace), or null if no such class exist

      • getNamedOntClass

        public NamedOntClass getNamedOntClass(java.lang.String conceptId)
        Returns class name with the given concept id in the ontologies managed by the catalog.
        Parameters:
        conceptId - complete name of class (with namespace)
        Returns:
        The named ontology class for the given concept id (local name plus namespace), or null if no such class exist
